alert.note: Alert for Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 7:26AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A BAND OF MODERATE TO BRIEFLY HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF TIOGA COUNTY... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 725 AM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from 16 miles west of Wellsboro to near Troy and moving southeast at 10 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Wellsboro, Mansfield, and Covington around 730 AM EST. Leonard Harrison State Park around 755 AM EST. Blossburg around 800 AM EST. This includes the following highways... Route 6 from near Gaines to the Bradford county line. Route 15 from Blossburg to Tioga. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
